p: Herbs of Tribulus terrestris L. (Zygophyllaceae) were collected in 2015 from the wild in various regions of China. The first two samples were collected in the province of Inner Mongolia, in the vicinity of the city of Bao Tou, where gray-brown desert soils, gray soils, chestnut, light meadow, mountain-steppe, and mountain-meadow soils dominate. Sample no. 1 was collected in June and sample no. 2 was collected in July.
